page.title: 10The Boggs,Allerton
page.content: The land cover of our square is {farmland}and{residential}.There are several main roads which pass through.Surrounding a reservoir is a mixed wood plantation.There are disused and unsightly quarries in the middle of our square.An{electricity} {Sub_Station}covers a large area.There are many{shops}in Allerton Eg: 2 Foodstores,Video_shop,Fish shop,Toyfair,Chemist,Lloyds Bank,Garage,Launderette,Post office,Greengrocers,Florist,Co-op.For leisure and recreation there are 4 public houses;The Kings Head,Jack & Gill,The Fleece and The Prince of Wales.There is also a sports ground.For the community,there is a Methodist Chapel and a First School.
